Row.Text: Welcome to Gao, seat of the immaculate Songhai Empire; I am King Sonni Ali Ber, ruler of this land and leader of its army.
And in the end it was all for nothing...
The Songhai will never be conquered!
You have presented yourself as a strong and reliable partner. I would like to extend to you a Declaration of Friendship between our nations. Do you accept?
You are a weak barbarian![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
It is the destiny of the Songhai to achieve greatness. You are the next trial on the path, and soon to be the latest fallen foe.
Your people are coming too close to our nations border. I sense malignant intent behind these actions and will not accept further settlement!
I hope you drown on the way out.
It is great to see you again.
I know an army when I see one. Turn your troops around quickly!
The only thing I love more than crushing my enemies is filling the gold coffers. I have a lucrative trade for our peoples.
I forsee death in your future.
